abstract: An article last Sunday about Martek Biosciences misidentified the headquarters city of D. A. Davidson & Company, which employs Timothy S. Ramey, a food and beverage analyst who now has an “underperform” recommendation on Martek’s stock. Although Mr. Ramey’s office is in Portland, Ore., D. A. Davidson is based in Great Falls, Mont.

lead_paragraph: An article last Sunday about Martek Biosciences misidentified the headquarters city of D. A. Davidson & Company, which employs Timothy S. Ramey, a food and beverage analyst who now has an “underperform” recommendation on Martek’s stock. Although Mr. Ramey’s office is in Portland, Ore., D. A. Davidson is based in Great Falls, Mont.
